text: Aleksey Lavrik (; ; born 7 August 2000) is a Belarusian footballer. As of 2019, he plays for Minsk.Profile at pressball.by He is a son of Belarusian coach and former international footballer Andrei Lavrik.Alexey Lavrik: "Dad watches all our games." ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Belarusian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Minsk players
title: Aleksey Lavrik
